entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is packing his trunk in the dormitory on the night before his return to Privet Drive.

entities.name: privet drive
entities.description: Privet Drive is Harry's home address.

entities.name: leaving feast
entities.description: The Leaving Feast is an annual event where the winner of the Inte r-House Championship is announced.

entities.name: interview-house championship
entities.description: The Inte r-House Championship is a competition between Hogwarts houses.

entities.name: great hall
entities.description: The Great Hall is the main dining hall at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's best friends.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of Harry's best friends.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is a student at Hogwarts who died in the previous year.

entities.name: mad-eye moody
entities.description: Mad-Eye Moody is a wizard and a member of the Hogwarts staff.

relationships.description: Harry is attending the Leaving Feast.
Ron is present in the Great Hall with Harry and Hermione.
Hermione is present in the Great Hall with Ron and Harry.
The black drapes in the Great Hall are a mark of respect to Cedric.
